FuncDef: This command performs a lookup in the specified client-db by using specified input and displays the matching result.
CLIs: client-db <db-name> lookup idi string-type { fqdn | rfc822 } string-value <string-value> [ peer-ip <peer-ip-address> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the client-db.
Specifies the peer s tunnel IP address as input, either v4 or v6.
Specifies the peer s IDi as input. Values-fqdn, rfc822.
Specifies the peer s IDi of address type as input, either v4 or v6.
Specifies the value of FQDN or RFC822 IDi.
